title: Official Blind Review #1
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I made a quick assessment of this paper.
review:
Authors propose a very general framework of Homotopy to the deep learning set up and explores a few relevant theoretical issues.

Though the proposed idea is interesting, the depth and breadth of authors' presentation are simply lacking. The entire paper lacks focus and I suggest authors consider focusing on 1-2 well thought-out ideas. There are many 3-4 line long sentences that are hard to decipher. Please also consider making the presentation more accessible.

Overall, this paper does not meet the bar for ICLR.
